mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.parent_id as parentId, t.parent_ids as parentIds, t.parent_id as 'parent.id', p.name AS 'parent.name', t.code , t.create_time AS 'createTime', (select count(*) from order s WHERE s.parent_id=t.id) as hasChildren
LEFT JOIN order p ON p.id = t.parent_id
mapper.update: update order set parent_ids= CONCAT(#{newParentIds},substring(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1)) where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
mapper.delete: delete from order where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
